result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffrey G. Johann was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to pay fine, costs and DNA surcharge plus $15 payment plan fee at the rate of $75.00 per month commencing 11/15/15.
Defendant to pay costs and DNA surcharge with the payment plan established in Count 1.
Defendant to pay costs and DNA surcharge with the payment plan established in Count 1.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey G. Johann

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Payment hearing on April 12, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Payment hearing on February 14, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Jeffrey G. Johann in court, Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State heard on recomm.; Def. willing to proceed today; Court reviews right to counsel; Court reviews charges/penalties; Court reviews GPQPA & WOR; Def. pleads Guilty to all 3 counts; parties stip. to facts; Court finds plea and waiver made FVK&I and finds Def. guilty; State heard; Def. declines to make statement; Court imposes sentence

Count 1:
* $150 F+C = $442.00 plus $15PPF at rate of $75/mo. comm. 11/15/15 or 20 days in jail if FTP
* $200 DNA surcharge
Count 2
* $243 CC
* $200 DNA surcharge
Count 3
* $243 CC
* $200 DNA surcharge

Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does.  Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

Return date at 10-05-2015 01:30 pm.
Jury trial at 11-04-2015 08:30 am.

9:15 - Defendant, Jeffrey G. Johann in court, Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. Court enters Not Guilty plea. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.   Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does.  Return date scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for November 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.
